value:
$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We have no reinforcements coming?$k$pHow is this possible?! Veronica has
somehow tricked the prison guards
into inciting a rebellion!$k$pThe Empire's vassal houses should
be suppressing that rebellion!$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|They require time to organize their
forces and—$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Tell them to deploy immediately!
Kill Veronica and her band of rebels!$k$pIf they seem disinclined, remind them
of all they wish to have remain secret.$k$pNow go!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Letizia will be forced to respond
to Veronica by labeling her forces
a rebellious faction.$k$pThe armies of the vassal houses
will take time to muster. It seems
the outcome remains unclear.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|And what about Veronica?
Do the people know what's
really happening?$k$pCould we find a way to make it clear
that this was all Letizia's doing?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|The vassal houses have known
Veronica is innocent from the
very start.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Allowing Veronica's capture allowed
them certain freedoms, which they
took advantage of.$k$pThat is why they've played along.$k$pBut now they are being forced to
make a decision: to back Letizia
or to back Veronica...$k$pThey will choose whoever they
believe will enact policies that favor
the powerful among them.$k$pAs of now, it is unclear who they
will choose.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|So even knowing that Veronica is
innocent, there's a chance they
choose to side with Letizia?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|That is how the nobility of Embla
have always acted.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|They tend toward whatever they
imagine benefits them most...$k$pThat fact alone should make their
tactics simple enough to read.$k$pSeeing Director Letizia's fortunes
change may result in some of them
choosing to side against her.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|And then...truth will prevail!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|I hope that is the case.$k$p$EFace|In Embla, however, it is the victor
who decides the truth.$k$pAnd the defeated know no mercy.$k$p$Sbs150|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|A report's just come in! The enemy
is approaching!$k$pLetizia is on her way here!$k$p

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|We are beyond words now, I think.
There is no point in pleasantries.$k$pYou stand in the shadow of the
Curse Directive, and you will be
crushed beneath it!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This is not the end... I swear it!
Next time, I... You will suffer!$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The enemy has retreated, but there's
no telling how much time we have
before they return.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Veronica is on her way here. Letizia
surely knows she has no chance of
victory if Veronica arrives safely.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|As long as we can hold out until
then, we've won!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Yet she seems focused on us
rather than Princess Veronica...$k$pThe situation with the princess
is an internal issue for Embla, but
Askr openly sided with Veronica...$k$pIt's a delicate situation, and it must
be difficult for Letizia to maintain
her control.$k$pFocusing on us over eliminating
the threat to her authority seems
like bad strategy.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Letizia is nervous.$k$pShe knows that I was close to you
long ago, and so she must fear her
grip on the situation is failing.$k$pWith Askr allied with Veronica,
she may realize it's possible for
us to surround her.$k$pIf we do, she has nowhere to run.$k$pIf she's captured, she will be the one
to be executed. And it will be ordered
by Veronica.$k$pThat fear is what motivates her.$k$pIt's a shame... The Letizia I knew
could have been something more...
But that was long ago.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You were...close?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Yes. When we were young...$k$pBack then, she looked like a princess
had stepped out of a picture book.
She was beautiful, gentle, and kind...$k$pWhen we were children, the two
of us promised to—well, spoke of...
plans for our lives together.$k$pBut I've since realized that she spoke
falsely even then...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm sorry, Zacharias...$k$p$Sbs150|
